japanese:
もういいわ、三玖。
放してあげて。
translation: That's enough, Miku. Let her go.

japanese:
ごめんね、五月ちゃん。
二乃と三玖がどうしてもって言うからさ。
translation:
I'm sorry, Itsuki-chan.
Nino and Miku were insistent.

japanese: それに私たちも、ちょっと気になってたし。
translation: Plus, we were curious too.

japanese: 一花……四葉も……。
translation: Ichika...and Yotsuba too...

japanese:
さあ、話してもらうわよ？
一体どういうつもりなのかしら？
translation:
Now, tell us.
Just what are you up to?

japanese: それは……別に何も……。
translation: It's...nothing, really...

japanese:
気づいてないと思ったら大間違いよ？
私や三玖がフー君にアタックしようとしたら、
決まって邪魔しに来てるわよね？
translation:
Don't think we haven't noticed.
Whenever Miku or I try to attack Fu-kun,
you always come and interrupt, don't you?

japanese: そんなことは、あ、ありませんよぉ？
translation: I-I haven't been doing that?

japanese: そんなことある。
translation: Yes, you have.

japanese:
いい？
ここに連れて来たのは、あんたが何をしたいのか
はっきりさせるためよ。
translation:
Listen up, okay?
We brought you here to make it clear
what you want to do.

japanese: 白状するまで、部屋から出さない。
translation: We won't let you leave until you confess.

japanese: そんな……！？
translation: You wouldn't?!

japanese: さあ、キリキリ吐きなさい！
translation: Now, spit it out!

japanese:
（……言えるわけがありません。
　姉妹の平穏を守るために、みんなと
　上杉君との接触を阻止しているだなんて！）
translation:
(...I couldn't possibly tell them.
 That, I'm blocking all contact between Uesugi-kun
 and them, to protect the peace between us!)

japanese:
さっさと話してくれたら助かるんだけど？
こうしてる間にも、フー君と過ごせる時間が
どんどん減ってるんだから。
translation:
It would help if you actually spoke, hm?
Time we can spend with Fu-kun is running out
while we're here.

japanese: それは……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
あ！　わかった！
五月は、私たちが羽目を外しすぎないように
気を遣ってくれてるんじゃない？
translation:
Ah! I understand!
You're just being careful that we don't go overboard,
right, Itsuki?
Huh...?

japanese:
私たち、受験生だもん。
旅行だからって遊んでばっかじゃダメだって
思ってるんじゃない？
translation:
We're all students taking exams.
We can't just play around
on a trip like this, can we?

japanese:
（ああ、四葉！
　今はそのフォローがとてもありがたいです！）
translation:
(Ah, Yotsuba!
 Your support is so helpful right now!)

japanese:
じ、実はそうなんです！
いくら旅行と言っても、節度は
ちゃんと守らないといけませんからね！
translation:
A-actually, yes!
Even on a trip,
we must act in moderation, right?

japanese: はしゃぎすぎて、万が一怪我などしては大変です！
translation:
If we get too excited and someone gets hurt,
it'll be a problem!

japanese:
まあ、確かにそれは大事だよね。
ここは無人島だから、手当ても難しいわけだし。
translation:
Well, that's certainly important.
Since this is an uninhabited island,
treatment would be difficult too.

japanese:
でしょう？
ですから私が、心を鬼にしているわけです！
translation:
Right?
So, that's why I'm being so strict!

japanese:
ふーん……。
そういうことだったのね。
translation:
Hmm...
So that's what's going on.

japanese:
理由はわかったわ。
でも、ちょっとやりすぎじゃない？
translation:
I understand the reason.
But aren't you being a bit TOO strict?

japanese: それは……すみません。
translation: Well... I'm sorry.

japanese:
というか、島にいるときくらい
羽目外したって、いいじゃない。
translation:
Besides, isn't it okay
to let loose a bit while we're on the island?

japanese:
ただでさえフー君は真面目で、
勉強以外には興味がないって顔してるんだから。
translation:
ESPECIALLY because Fu-kun is always so serious,
and doesn't seem to have any interests
other than studying.

japanese:
そう。
これは、フータローとの距離を縮める
絶好のチャンス。
translation:
Exactly.
This is a great chance to get closer to Futaro.

japanese: で、ですから、私は……。
translation: Th-therefore, I...

japanese:
（それを許してしまったら、
　また修学旅行のときのようなことになって
　しまうかもしれません）
translation:
(If I allow that to happen,
 things might end up like how they were
 on the school trip again.)

japanese:
（ああ、私は本当に
　どうすればいいのですか、お母さん！）
translation: (Ah, really now, what should I do, Mother?!)

japanese: まったく、五月ちゃんは……。
translation: Come on now, Itsuki-chan...

japanese:
んー、そうだなぁ。
五月ちゃんの気持ちもわかるけど――
translation:
Hmmm, let's see.
I can understand your feelings, Itsuki, but%p-2;――

japanese:
私も、せっかく別荘に来たんだし
もっといっぱい遊びたいって思っちゃうなぁ。
translation:
We've come here to the villa, and have this chance,
so I'd really like to have some more fun.

japanese:
なにより、今日と明日は
想い出作りをしようって話になってるわけだしさ。
translation:
Above all, we agreed to make memories
today and tomorrow, didn't we?

japanese:
そうだよね、上杉さんと想い出作りをしたいよ。
この夏の、最高の想い出を！
translation:
Yeah, I want to make unforgettable memories
with Uesugi-san this summer!

japanese: そうよね！
translation: That's right!

japanese: うんうん。
translation: Indeed.

japanese: （ああ、ダメです、このままでは……）
translation:
(Ahh, this is no good,
 if things keep up like this...)

japanese: でもさ、ちょっと心配なことがあって。
translation: But, I'm a bit worried about something.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
私たち５人が揃って
あっちこっちに振り回したら、
フータロー君、すっごく疲れちゃうんじゃない？
translation:
If the five of us pull Futaro-kun all over the place, 
won't he get really tired?

japanese: ……それは、まあ。
translation: ...Well, I guess.

japanese: 確かに……。
translation: That's for sure...

japanese:
私たちが楽しくても、
上杉さんが疲れちゃったらダメだよね。
楽しい想い出にならないよ。
translation:
Even if we are having fun,
it's not okay if Uesugi-san gets overwhelmed.
That won't be a fun memory, will it?

japanese:
でしょ？
お互いに楽しかったって言える想い出にしたいよね。
translation:
Right?
We should make memories
where everyone can say they had fun.

japanese: ええ、当然だわ。
translation: Yes, of course.

japanese:
フータローを疲れさせないで
想い出を作れる方法……？
translation: How can we make memories without tiring Futaro?

japanese:
ふふ、実はね、その方法を思いついちゃったんだ。
ここは１つ、公平に勝負で決めない？
translation:
Hehe, actually, I came up with a way to do that.
So why don't we settle it fair and square
with a contest?

japanese: へ？　勝負ってどういうこと？
translation: Huh? A contest, what do you mean?

japanese:
ほら、みんなで一斉に行動するから
色々とエスカレートしちゃうわけでしょ？
だったら、いっそ――
translation:
You know, since we'll all be doing things together,
Things can escalate pretty quickly, right?
So, why not%p-2;――

japanese:
『フータロー君と１日過ごす権利』を賭けた
真剣勝負をして、負けた人は邪魔をしないって
ことにするの。
translation:
Let's have a serious contest for
'the right to spend a day with Futaro-kun' at stake.
The losers will agree not to get in the way.

japanese: フー君と……！
translation: The right to....!

japanese: １日過ごす権利……！
translation: Spend a day with Futaro...!

japanese:
え、ええ、えええぇっ！？
どうしてそうなるんですか！？
translation:
Wha-WHA-WHAAAAAT?!
How did it come to that?!

japanese: 私はその話に乗ってもいいわ。
translation: I'm down for that.

japanese: はいっ！？
translation: HUH?!

japanese:
フー君に迷惑をかけるのは論外だし、
悪くない落とし所だと思うけど？
うん、さすが一花。
translation: Yes. Well done, Ichika.

japanese:
ありがと～。
こういうときくらい、お姉ちゃんしないとね。
translation:
Thaaanks.
It's at times like these I gotta be the older sister.

japanese:
（あああああ……！
　２人がやる気になっていますよ！？）
translation:
(AAAAAAHH...!
 Both of them are so fired up?!)

japanese:
あの、私は不参加でいい？
らいはちゃんと過ごしたいし。
translation:
Um, can I sit this out?
I want to spend time with Raiha-chan.

japanese:
それはダーメ！
姉妹は平等かつ公平にしないとね。
translation:
That won't do!
Sisters must be equal and fair.

japanese: というわけで、五月ちゃんも参加だから。
translation: Therefore, Itsuki-chan will participate as well.

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと待ってください！
そんな、上杉君に断りもなく……。
translation:
Wa-wait, hold on one second!
You can't just do that
without asking Uesugi-kun first...

japanese:
勝負内容はどうする？
料理対決とか？
translation:
What kind of contest should it be?
How about a cooking contest?

japanese:
あんた、私に勝てると思ってるわけ？
ちょっと腕を上げてるからって
調子に乗らないほうがいいわ。
translation:
Do you think you can beat me?
Don't get too cocky just because you're improving.

japanese:
二乃こそ、油断して
足元をすくわれても知らないから。
translation:
You're the one who shouldn't
be letting your guard down, Nino.

japanese:
いやいや、料理はなしでしょ。
二乃が有利すぎるもん。
translation:
No, no, let's not have a cooking contest.
Nino would have too much of an advantage.

japanese:
はあ？
普段、私に任せっきりのあんたたちが
悪いんじゃない。
translation:
What?
Isn't it your fault
that you leave everything to me all the time?

japanese:
まあまあ、二乃。
ここも姉妹は平等で公平ってことにしようよ。
translation:
Hey, hey, Nino.
Let's make sure us sisters treat each other
equally and fairly here too.

japanese:
じゃあ、運動関係もなしね。
四葉が有利すぎるわ。
translation:
Then, no sports-related activities either.
You would have too much of an advantage, Yotsuba.

japanese: もちろん、それでいいよ。
translation: Of course, I'm okay with that.

japanese:
せっかく島だし水泳勝負とか思ったけど、
確かに四葉に勝てる気はしないなぁ。
translation:
I was thinking about a swimming match,
but yeah, I don't think I can beat Yotsuba.

japanese: 無理……！
translation: No way...!

japanese:
（は、話がどんどん進んでいきますよ！？
　なぜ、どうして、こんなことに……）
translation:
(Th-things are progressing so quickly?!
 Why, just why, is this happening...)

japanese: 五月は？　何かある？
translation: How about you, Itsuki? Any ideas?

japanese: え？　あ、私は……。
translation: Huh? Ah, I...

japanese:
島にあるものを活かして、ってことにすれば
楽しくていいかもね。
translation:
If we make use of what's on the island,
it'd be really fun, right?

japanese: 別に楽しむ必要ない気がするけど。
translation: Although, we don't necessarily have to have fun.

japanese: 島にあるもの……。
translation: Something on the island...

japanese:
そういえば、前に四葉が、お父さんの部屋に
服がたくさん置いてあったと言ってましたよね。
translation:
Oh, speaking of which,
Yotsuba mentioned before
that there were lots of clothes in Dad's room.

japanese:
ああ、うん。
別荘を探検してたときに見つけたよ。
translation: Ah, yeah. I found them when I was exploring the villa.

japanese: あっ！　それよ、五月！
translation: Ah! That's it, Itsuki!

japanese: へっ！？
translation: Huh?!

japanese:
ファッションショーよ！
誰が一番、フー君が気に入ってくれる
コーディネートができるか勝負するの！
translation:
Let's have a fashion show!
We can compete to see who can come up with
the best outfit that Fu-kun will like the most!

japanese:
これなら、フー君に勝敗を決めてもらえるから
納得いくでしょ？
translation:
If we have Fu-kun decide the winner,
everyone will be satisfied, right?

japanese: なるほど……。
translation: I see...

japanese:
うん、いいんじゃないかな？
面白そう。
translation:
Sure, wouldn't that work?
It sounds interesting.

japanese: でも上杉さん、協力してくれるかな？
translation: But will Uesugi-san cooperate?

japanese: してもらうのよ！　何がなんでも！
translation: He will! No matter what!

japanese: さあ、そうと決まればフー君のところに行くわよ！
translation:
Alright, if that's the decision,
let's go get Fu-kun!

japanese:
え、あ、ちょっと、二乃！？
待ってください……！
translation:
Eh, ah, hold on, Nino?!
Hold on a second...!
